General.Name: Jiangsu Sihuan Bioengineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Sihuan Bioengineering Co., Ltd. engages in the pharmaceutical business in China. It offers delusen, an anti-tumor biotherapeutic drug for the treatment of kidney cancer, malignant melanoma, and cancerous chest and abdominal mass; Xinde Lusheng; Xin Lisheng; and Ring BO. It also engages in breeding and sales of flowers and seedlings; and landscaping projects. Jiangsu Sihuan Bioengineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.
General.Address: No. 7 Binjiang East Road, Jiangyin, China, 214400

2.Name: Mr. Yang  Zhou
2.Title: Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
